interestingcomments.content:
New owner of SX740 seeks mini tripod and small carrying bag suggestions... /!/ I just bought myself the SX740HS. 

I already own a 50" tripod but that's too big to carry around for walking in the woods. 

Can you suggest a mini tripod -- primarily to assist with the higher zooms when it's unstable to hold in my hands. Searching the archive shows the gorilla, is that still advised?

And, then what is a simple and small bag -- to hold the camera and tripod -- while walking in the neighborhood or in the woods or other places? Nothing bulky. I don't need a million pockets. And ideally in a messenger bag sort of style.
